name: IF: Make a choice
description:
IF is a storyline platformer about the exciting adventure of two robots.

Mechanics Tin and Fly repairs mechanisms, but one day they meet an unknown monster. Now they need to go beyond the ordinary life to save themselves and their world.

Adventure tells the story about an amazing valley considered a lonely island of life until now. But the valley with its mechanical cities, mines, and roads merged into a single infrastructure is inhabited by robots.
